node.title: Homicide investigation launched after death of man in Nelson
node.description: A man has died after being shot at a house in central Nelson this afternoon.
node.content:
["A man has died after being shot at a house in central Nelson this afternoon.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Claire Eastham-Farrelly\n
", "Police were called to the Washington Road address after 1pm today, after reports a person had been injured.", "The man died at the scene and police have now launched a homicide investigation.", "Police want to speak with anyone who might have information about the incident or those involved.", "Those with information can phone 105 and quote file number 220222/7060 or share information anonymously through Crimestoppers on 0800 555 111.", "Earlier the Armed Offenders Squad were at the scene as a precaution."]
